item.title: Football Heroes League launches September 16 for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/football-heroes-league-launches-september-16-for-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-xbox-one-switch-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Free-to-play multiplayer soccer game currently in Early Access for PC.

Free-to-play multiplayer soccer game Football Heroes League will leave Early Access and launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on September 16, developer Run Games announced.

Football Heroes League first launched in Early Access for PC on May 2.

“A lot of us at Run Games are life-long soccer players, and Football Heroes League reflects our love of the game,” said Run Games president Michael Marzola in a press release. “We wanted to take what we love about soccer—the tactics and excitement and spectacle of it—and combine it with our love of arcade sports games and hero shooters. Soccer is for everybody, and we think this is a perfect way for old-school fans and newcomers alike to enjoy it together.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Run Games:

About

Football Heroes League is a high-octane multiplayer soccer game where superhuman abilities meet precise controls. A real person controls every player on the pitch, creating dynamic matches blending tactics with spectacular special moves. Master the intuitive third-person control system to aim shots, thread perfect passes, and unleash mind-blowing character abilities that defy physics. Team up with friends, show off your skills, and climb the ranks to become a legendary Soccer God!

Key Features

  • Online Soccer Evolved – Experience soccer reimagined with astounding heroic abilities blended with strategic gameplay for high-stakes competitive matches.
  • Precise Controls
    • Master the innovative aiming system to unleash perfect shots and passes.
    • Charge your kicks for devastating power plays.
    • Execute advanced moves like juggling, trapping, and precision dribbling.
    • Dominate with strategic steals and slide tackles.
  • Legendary Heroes – Choose from a diverse roster of extraordinary characters, with more to come throughout Early Access:
    • Kenzo – Blaze through defenses with explosive jet boots.
    • Beckers – Control the ball’s destiny with revolutionary mag bots.
    • Leo – Unleash raw power to hammer through any opposition.
    • Frostine – Gracefully glide across the arena, freezing opponents in their tracks.
    • Bun.e – Command robotic BunBots to defend and strike with style.
  • Competitive Progression
    • Team up with friends in dynamic online matches.
    • Unlock new characters and customize your look.
    • Climb from rookie divisions to legendary Soccer God status.
    • Enjoy skill-based matchmaking for perfectly balanced games.
    • Complete daily and weekly quests to earn rewards.
  • Game Modes
    • Jump into two-versus-two, three-versus-three, or five-versus-five matches.
    • Train against AI opponents.
    • Master abilities in a dedicated Training Mode.
    • Coming Soon: Instant Replay System to capture your greatest moments.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked launches in late 2025 for PS5, PS VR2, PC, and Quest
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/demeo-x-dungeons-dragons-battlemarked-launches-in-late-2025-for-ps5-ps-vr2-pc-and-quest

  • PC
  • PS VR2
  • PS5
  • Quest

First gameplay trailer released.

Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation VR2, PC and SteamVR, and Quest in late 2025, developer Resolution Games announced.

“While the world of Demeo is rich with lore, our previous titles focus primarily on tactical action over motivation and narrative,” said Resolution Games founder and CEO Tommy Palm in a press release. “With Dungeons & Dragons, story is just as important as combat, so we’ve rebalanced our approach to make sure we can deliver more of it. With the addition of dramatic cut scenes, richer dialogue, and deeper player choices, Battlemarked truly marks the start of the next iteration of the Demeo Action Roleplaying System.”

narrative lead Mat Sernett added, “When Dungeons & Dragons launched fifth edition back in 2014, the first adventure that many players went on ventured into Neverwinter Wood, and I can think of no place better for Battlemarked players to begin their journey. The first adventure in Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked will take players to familiar locations including Cragmaw Castle and Mount Hotenow. The world of Dungeons & Dragons is just as much a part of the story as its characters, and we can’t wait for players to immerse themselves in its dangers and delights.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Resolution Games:

About

Assemble your party and embark on epic adventures in the Forgotten Realms, where ancient rivalries, shadowy conspiracies, and the lure of dark power threaten to tear Faerûn apart.

The North teeters on the brink of war, and it’s up to you to unravel hidden secrets, face powerful enemies, forge fragile alliances, and expose the masterminds behind the plot before chaos consumes all.

Dive into fast-paced, turn-based combat that brings the Dungeons & Dragons experience into a new dimension. You’ll need all your cunning, courage, and strategy to survive. Will you lead your allies to victory, or watch as the world burns?

Take the Initiative

Battle dark forces deep within the wilds of Neverwinter Wood and face powerful enemies. Built with the Demeo Action Roleplaying System and launching with multiple adventures (with more on the way), forge legendary bonds with friends as you confront the shadowy figures that threaten the Forgotten Realms.

Play Your Way

Team up in a co-operative multiplayer system that supports up to four players or take on the challenge alone by building the adventuring party that suits your style—no Dungeon Master required. Whether you’re leading your allies on an adventure or embarking on a solo quest, you shape your story.

Take the Initiative

Engage in dynamic, turn-based combat where every move matters. Your strategy evolves based on the traits of iconic D&D classes, the abilities of your allies, and the strength of your hand. Whether you’re a cunning rogue, a mighty paladin, or a powerful sorcerer, mastery of the battlefield is essential as you battle monsters, overcome traps, and discover legendary treasures!

Watch the gameplay reveal trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Roguelike clean ’em up game Scrubbin’ Trubble announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/roguelike-clean-em-up-game-scrubbin-trubble-announced-for-pc

Odd Object—a new studio founded by Stevie Hryciw (The Indie Game Legend 3D, Catacomb Kids) and veteran animator and roguelike developer Tyriq Plummer (Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer featuring The Legend of Zelda, Catacomb Kids, UFO 50)—has announced “roguelike clean ’em up” game Scrubbin’ Trubble. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2025. 

Here is an overview of the game, via Odd Object:

About

Scrubbin’ Trubble is a roguelike clean ’em up. Crush grime-ridden enemies on your own or in cooperative play for up to four players in this turn-based game inspired by the look and feel of action RPGs and hack-and-slash brawlers, where the cleaning and fighting seem to never end!

You can’t clean without getting down and dirty in Scrubbin’ Trubble! Choose from a variety of RPG-inspired classes, each with a unique way to tackle the grime, including Bubbaladin, an absorbent close-range attacker; Bleacher, a long-range stain-cleaning sniper; Washbuckler, who damages and pushes back enemies with a splash, and more! You’ll also find a variety of useful equipment and single-use items that can help turn the tide of combat.

Scrub your way through each randomized floor of The House, cleaning up filth-fueled baddies lurking in the muck. As you descend through the floors, you’ll earn high scores and upgrade your characters based on how well you perform. Reach the end of your run to take on one of the Four Filths of the Apocalypse, but beware: if your whole party gets wiped out, it’s game over, and you’ll have to start all over from the beginning!

Key Features

  • Play solo or in local and online cooperative play for up to four players.
  • Choose from six different classes with unique skills and strengths to support the team.
  • Upgrade your attacks and characters to add new effects and powers.
  • Take on pun-riddled Nasties like Mildude, Asbeastos, Refusphynx, and more.
  • Wield equipment and items like the “Wiper Rifle” and “Splash Bang” to clean up your foes.
  • Accessible learning curve and quick-session design lets you jump in and have fun whether you have a little time—or a lot!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Shueisha Games and SAYIL GAMES announce sci‑fi boss‑rush action game BAKUDO for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/shueisha-games-and-sayil-games-announce-sci%e2%80%91fi-boss%e2%80%91rush-action-game-bakudo-for-pc

  • PC

Fusing "high‑octane ball‑sport mechanics with exhilarating combat."

Publisher Shueisha Games and developer SAYIL GAMES have announced BAKUDO, a science-fiction boss‑rush action game that fuses “high‑octane ball‑sport mechanics with exhilarating combat.” It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

BAKUDO is a science-fiction boss‑rush action game fusing high‑octane ball‑sport mechanics with exhilarating combat. Enroll at an elite BAKUDO academy and clash with formidable opponents as you uncover a major conspiracy. When determination is put to the ultimate test, you must tip the scales of destiny.

The Ultimate Ball-Combat Sport Beyond Imagination

Experience the unique combat system of BAKUDO—an all-new ball game packed with excitement and tension. On a battlefield with no rules or limits, your determination is your greatest weapon. Every competitor stakes it all, pulling out every trick to claim ultimate supremacy. In the BAKUDO arena, fiery determination and unshakeable spirit collide!

Main Setting

Strength is everything at this elite academy founded specifically for BAKUDO. Here, students fight relentlessly to reach the pinnacle. You’ll step into the shoes of Yuria as she enrolls at the academy in search of her missing father, and forge deep bonds with a colorful cast of characters along the journey. However, the academy holds more secrets than it appears, and what awaits our hero is far from simple…

When Ball-Sport Combat Meets Action

Engage in real-time battles against formidable bosses with a unique, fast-paced combat system centered around dynamic ball-throwing techniques. Observe your opponents, learn their movements, and exploit their weaknesses to seize victory.

Are you ready to enter this battlefield fueled by fiery determination?

The Eight Stars of Academy

Face off against the academy’s reigning elites. Known as the Eight Stars, each boasts a unique and formidable combat style. Only by reading their movements and countering at just the right moment can you hope to defeat them.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Neon Inferno launches October 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/neon-inferno-launches-october-2

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

2D run-and-gun and gallery-shooter hybrid dated.

Neon Inferno, a fusion of 2D run-and-gun and gallery-shooter set in New York City 2055, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on October 2, publisher Retroware and developer Zenovia announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Retroware:

About

Taking inspiration from classic titles like Contra and Wild Guns, Neon Inferno splits the action into the foreground and background with a variety of enemies and bosses in levels set in a dystopian New York City of 2055.

Developed by Zenovia Interactive and published by Retroware, Neon Inferno lets players take on the role of either Angelo or Mariana as they fight for a fledgling crime family striving for power against a corrupt NYPD and other crime syndicates in the war-torn metropolis.

With “Bullet Time,” players can deflect certain projectiles back at enemies they choose—regardless of whether they’re in the foreground or background! With multiple upgrades available to equip between missions, multiple difficulties, including an Arcade Mode, and two-player co-op available, players will be able to tackle their missions however they choose.

Key Features

  • Shoot Close, Aim Far – A dynamic blend of side-scroller and gallery-shooter, where the action takes place in both foreground and background (like playing Contra and Wild Guns at the same time).
  • Glorious 32-Bit Style – A science-fiction cityscape rendered in beautiful pixel art and backed by an evocative soundtrack.
  • Two-Player Cooperative Play – With danger lurking around every street corner, wouldn’t you be better off with a friend?
  • Satisfying Arcade Challenge – Enjoy a playthrough on an easier mode… or put your skills and resilience to the test with 1-credit-clear arcade mode.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

item.title: Billie Bust Up limited-time demo now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/billie-bust-up-limited-time-demo-now-available

A limited-time demo for 3D musical platformer Billie Bust Up is now available for PC via Steam until June 9, publisher Humble Games and developer Giddy Goat Games announced.

Here is an overview of the demo, via Humble Games:

About

From magical music abilities to dazzling dance moves, join the courageous young goat Billie and embark on a whimsical journey inspired by the cartoon classics of your childhood. Uncover the secrets of her father’s mysterious past and harness enchanted powers as you face off against spectacular villains in beat-driven boss battles.

One such villain making his debut in the demo? Fantoccio—a dramatic, slightly unhinged puppet who’s been trapped in the crumbling magical city of Harpis Major for fifteen long years. When Billie stumbles into his world, Fantoccio seizes the chance to finally stage the grand play he’s been planning in the name of “friendship.” There’s just one small catch: Billie isn’t exactly thrilled about being cast. So naturally, Fantoccio’s next move is… brainwashing!

With unforgettable characters, original toe-tapping songs, and a story that dances between heartfelt and hilarious, Billie Bust Up hits all the right notes.

Key Features

  • Move to the Music – Engage in rhythm-based battles where your attacks sync to the beat, and music adapts to your play style, creating dynamic, ever-changing gameplay experiences.
  • An Enchanting Ensemble – Team up with a quirky cast of heroes and villains, each with their own unique personalities and backstories, in a whimsical, adventurous tale.
  • For the Young at Heart – Inspired by animated classics, Billie Bust Up blends fantasy, humor, and heartfelt moments with a story of friendship, family, and hidden secrets.
  • Showstopping Songs – Experience character-driven songs composed by Daniel Ingram.
  • Embrace the Magic – Use a variety of magical abilities, from gliding with an umbrella wand to freezing enemies, solving puzzles, and vanishing into invisibility.
  • A Welcoming World – Customize your gameplay experience to suit your needs and preferences with a wide range of accessibility options. Tailor the game to be more accessible by enabling features like invincibility, low contrast mode for low vision, or turning off timed events.

Watch a new trailer below.

“I’ve Had Enough of You” Demo Trailer
